name: ThinkMedia PARTNERS
tag_list: social-media, marketing, pr, b2b, tech, start-ups, vc
overview:
ThinkMedia PARTNERS is a boutique communications and marketing consulting firm. The firm provides strategic public relations, thought leadership, social media and marketing services for innovative, high-growth companies and market-leading organizations.

The ThinkMedia PARTNERS team members have 20+ yearsâ€™ experience working successfully with more than 150 B2B technology companies and professional services firms in the U.S., Europe and Asia. They have launched dozens of angel and venture funded start-ups and re-invigorated and re-positioned global Fortune 1000 firms.

Current clients include Lionbridge Technologies, HCL Technologies and VisualDNA. Alumni clients we have worked with include Archer Technologies (now RSA Security), Battery Ventures, EMC, HP, Keane, SpeechWorks (now Nuance) and many others.
